code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Header}from'./components/layout/Header';import{BottomNav}from'./components/layout/BottomNav';import{SummaryStats}from'./features/dashboard/SummaryStats';import{AddEntryForm}from'./features/entries/AddEntryForm';import{EntryList}from'./features/entries/EntryList';import{UserStats}from'./features/entries/UserStats';import{useEntries}from'./hooks/useEntries';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('add');const{entries,addEntry,deleteEntry,totalAmount,userStats}=useEntries();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 pb-24 font-sans text-gray-900",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"p-4 max-w-md mx-auto",children:[activeTab==='add'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SummaryStats,{totalAmount:totalAmount,entryCount:entries.length}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transition-all duration-300",children:[activeTab==='add'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddEntryForm,{onAdd:addEntry}),activeTab==='history'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EntryList,{entries:entries,onDelete:deleteEntry}),activeTab==='stats'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserStats,{stats:userStats})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BottomNav,{activeTab:activeTab,setActiveTab:setActiveTab})]});}export default App;
